channel.title: Started new server, looking for coder?
channel.description:
Hi my name is mike and i recently started a server with my friend, i have coded for years in the past but this server im with just has to many problems but does have the potential to be a great server. I'm looking for a coder to help me fix my server
if you feel up for it just reply and we can figure something out.
Thanks! Mike.

item.title: Started new server, looking for coder?

317 and skype is tom.chalkley1
